name: llm-professor-client-nodejs
description: Node.js client for LLM Engineering Professor Assistant (OpenAI Responses API + Anthropic Batch API)

scripts.setup-global: npm install -g openai @anthropic-ai/sdk dotenv prompts chalk
scripts.check-deps: node -e "console.log('✅ Checking global packages...'); ['openai', '@anthropic-ai/sdk', 'dotenv', 'prompts', 'chalk'].forEach(pkg => { try { require.resolve(pkg); console.log('  ✅', pkg); } catch { console.log('  ❌', pkg, '- Run: npm run setup-global'); } });"

author: Sebastian C.
